page.title: 13COMMUNITY DATA AVAILABLE
page.content: {PUBLICATIONS AVAILABLE FROM Your Guide To Marple B L The Changing Face of Marple B L { Top Lock to Aqueduct B L Top Lock to Bottoms Hall B L Brabyns Park Interest Trail B L Walking Around Marple B L Marple Rail Trails B L Marple Historical Trail 1 B L The Strines Journal L Glimpses of Mellor L CH All Saints' Church 1880/1980 L CH Gone Banding 1900/1983 B L Marple in the 1851 Census B L {KEY:}B buy at bookshops L from library CH buy from the church We think that the above list of books will help you to understand the area in which we live - the present and the past.
